name: Shining Magikarp
author: Ken Sugimori
flavor_text: An underpowered, pathetic Pokémon. It may jump high on rare occasions, but never more than seven feet.

attacks.name: Gold Scale
attacks.effect: Your opponent may draw 2 cards. Either way, you may draw 2 cards.

attacks.name: Dragon Bond
attacks.effect: Search your deck for a card named Gyarados, Dark Gyarados, or Shining Gyarados. Show it to your opponent and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

rule_box: You can’t have more than 1 Shining Magikarp in your deck.
